title: A robot arm with puppy dog eyes is just one of Lenovo’s new desktop AI concepts
summary: Lenovo's AI Workmate Concept, unveiled at MWC 2026, is a robotic arm with an expressive screen and local AI processing designed as a desk companion for office productivity and support.

title: Kalshi voids some bets on Khamenei’s ouster because it’s ‘directly tied to death’
summary: Kalshi voided certain bets on Iranian Supreme Leader Khamenei's ouster following his death, citing a policy against markets directly tied to death. The predictive betting platform is refunding fees and reimbursing anyone who purchased shares after the event, though the handling has drawn criticism.
content:
In a statement on X, Kalshi CEO Tarek Mansour said his company would pay out positions on "Ali Khamenei out as Supreme Leader?" at the last trading price before his death. Mansour said that Kalshi doesn't "list markets directly tied to death" and that its rules are designed to "prevent people from profiting from death." In addition, Kalshi is refunding fees related to the market and reimbursing anyone who purchased shares after Khamenei's death. 
Some users have voiced anger at how the situation was handled, claiming that either Kalshi's rules should have been communicated more clearly, or that its markets should have been more narrowly wor …

de.summary: Einige Tierarten können ihre interne Körpertemperatur dramatisch regulieren und können so extreme Wetterereignisse, Überschwemmungen und Begegnungen mit Raubtieren effektiver überstehen als andere Lebewesen.

es.title: Los animales extraños que controlan su temperatura corporal
es.summary: Algunas especies animales pueden regular drásticamente su temperatura corporal interna, permitiéndoles sobrevivir a eventos climáticos extremos, inundaciones y encuentros con depredadores de manera más efectiva que otras criaturas.

title: The trap Anthropic built for itself
summary: Anthropic and other AI companies have long promised responsible self-governance, but without formal regulatory oversight, there are few mechanisms to hold them accountable. This governance gap creates a potential vulnerability as these companies shape the future of AI.
content: Anthropic, OpenAI, Google DeepMind and others have long promised to govern themselves responsibly. Now, in the absence of rules, there's not a lot to protect them.

zh.title: 人工智能公司为自己建造的陷阱
zh.summary: 人工智能公司长期以来承诺负责任的自我治理，但没有正式的监管监督，很少有机制能够追究它们的责任。这种治理缺陷在这些公司塑造人工智能未来时造成了潜在的脆弱性。

fr.title: Le piège qu'Anthropic s'est construit
fr.summary: Anthropic et d'autres entreprises d'IA ont longtemps promis une autogouvernance responsable, mais sans supervision réglementaire formelle, il existe peu de mécanismes pour les tenir responsables. Cette lacune de gouvernance crée une vulnérabilité potentielle alors que ces entreprises façonnent l'avenir de l'IA.

de.title: Die Falle, die Anthropic für sich selbst gebaut hat
de.summary: Anthropic und andere KI-Unternehmen haben lange Zeit verantwortungsvolle Selbstregulierung versprochen, aber ohne formale behördliche Aufsicht gibt es nur wenige Mechanismen, um sie zur Rechenschaft zu ziehen. Diese Governance-Lücke schafft eine potenzielle Schwachstelle, da diese Unternehmen die Zukunft der KI gestalten.

es.title: La trampa que Anthropic se construyó a sí misma
es.summary: Anthropic y otras empresas de IA han prometido durante mucho tiempo la autogobernanza responsable, pero sin supervisión regulatoria formal, hay pocos mecanismos para responsabilizarlas. Esta brecha de gobernanza crea una vulnerabilidad potencial mientras estas empresas moldean el futuro de la IA.
